lead_paragraph: In a video on Facebook, Wendy Melvoin, who played guitar and sang with the group, did not specify when or where its shows would take place.

headline.print_headline: Prince’s Ex-Band Members to Reunite for Live Shows
headline.main: The Revolution, Prince’s Former Band, Says It Will Reunite

snippet: In a video on Facebook, Wendy Melvoin, who played guitar and sang with the group, did not specify when or where its shows would take place.
abstract: Former members of Revolution, music group founded by Prince, announce plans for reunion concerts.
